abstract: Google is getting into the business of writing e-books with a marketing book titled “Winning the Zero Moment of Truth.”
snippet: Google is getting into the business of writing e-books with a marketing book titled “Winning the Zero Moment of Truth.”
lead_paragraph: Google seems to be able to do just about anything, at least if the robust earnings report the company issued on Thursday is any indication. So perhaps it is not surprising that Google is also getting into the business of writing e-books.

headline.main: Google Offers Marketing Ideas, by the Book
